attributes.action: reverse the decision to scrap the 10% tax band, or compensate those millions negatively affected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a policy which penalises the poorer paid or those fixed incomes from other sources to pay towards increasing the income of other poorer households and, more importantly, to decrease the tax burden on the higher paid.

Gordon Brown is a reverse Robin Hood - he robs the poor to pay the rich
